forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
